key.name: update-time
key.description: The seconds after walNUT updates the data from the system.

key.name: temp-unit
key.description: The unit ('Centigrade' or 'Fahrenheit', without quotes) the extension should display the temperature in.

key.name: display-na
key.description: Display also not available devices in the submenu in the panel menu (chosen device will be always displayed, also if not available, in spite of this option).

key.name: display-raw
key.description: Show also raw data in a submenu.

key.name: display-cmd-desc
key.description: Display also a localized description of the device's available commands in the sub menu.

key.name: hide-pw
key.description: Whether the password at credentials box should be hidden or not.

key.name: panel-icon-display-load
key.description: Whether the device load should be displayed in panel icon or not.

key.name: panel-text-display-load
key.description: Whether the device load should be displayed in panel label or not.

key.name: panel-text-display-charge
key.description: Whether the battery charge should be displayed in panel label or not.

key.name: ups
key.description: List devices already found. UPS name, host, port, user and password. First in the array is the chosen one.

key.name: timeout
key.description: The seconds after walNUT shuld give up when invoking upsc and upscmd.
